original_text: Then the prophets, Haggai the prophet, and Zechariah the son of Iddo, prophesied unto the Jews that were in Judah and Jerusalem in the name of the God of Israel, even unto them.
korean_text: 선지자들 곧 선지자 학개와 잇도의 손자 스가랴가 이스라엘의 하나님의 이름으로 유다와 예루살렘에 거주하는 유다 사람들에게 예언하였더니

sentences.original_text: Then the prophets, Haggai the prophet, and Zechariah
son of Iddo, prophesied unto the Jews
that were in Judah and Jerusalem
in the name of the God of Israel
